tool_description: API serves from large collections of quotes. A GET request will give you quote, author and related tags.
name: Random Quote Generator
title: Random Quote Generator

api_list.name: Request Random Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-generator2.p.rapidapi.com/randomQuote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-generator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-generator2.p.rapidapi.com/randomQuote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-generator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
